en.tip: Mining for bamboo uses your CPU power. Please adjust the speed and threads according to your personal preferences. Bamboo number is updated every minute.Due to local hash synchronization with the server, there be some data mistake in the first few minute.But they will be normal gradually.

cn.tip: 本次挖矿主要通过电脑的cpu进行，可以根据自己的电脑cpu性能，通过点击上方的加减号进行速率调整。竹子数量的每分钟更新一次。由于本地挖矿数据与服务器端获取数据的同步差异，前几分钟的有效哈希值可能会有偏差，但之后会逐渐同步过来，请大家放心！
